reviewText: I was looking for and intelligent adult film with attractive people in it.  What I got was some lame film with a few fairly attractive women that you don't get to see very much of.  The photography was all over the place and the scenes were short and jumpy.  All the women had super huge breasts and most looked fake.  And you didn't see too much other than their breasts.  I wish I didn't spend the money.  I bought this DVD after reading the good reviews and now I'm angry.  Don't waste your money...really!

As a big Bust Feature dancer, I am always being asked to work on diffrent projects and such. I have seen a lot of what is out there and most of it is junk.
However, there is the unique exception. . .
Director D.Kelly Marsalis and his body of work is just erotic and truly amazing! His latest DVD California Dreams: Beach Blanket Malibu is a look at some of the most stunning women set in and around the beaches of Malibu California.
The hot models Aria Giovanni, Lorissa, Nikki, Zoe and a few others are great and very sexy and give a great hot show of themselves.
I love the music!!!
I love the look of the DVD!
I love the interviews!
I love the sexy Director and the lips on this man!
I'm losing track here(oops)but this DVD is hot and classy at the same time. Being a model myself, I look at things with a diffrent eye and looking at D.Kelly Marsalis' work is like looking at erotic high art at it's best!
It's unique!
It's it's own style!
It's very sexy!
It's very cool!
It's funny!
It sould be your next DVD!

I have probally one of the biggest collections of erotic vidoes and DVD's in the world. I review and work in this business as an editor for Hustler magazine and have seen all there is to see out there.
But the work D.Kelly Marsalis is putting down in the erotic scene is the best stuff since Russ Meyer, hands down!
His creative eye and the style he has is unmatched by any of the other stuff that is out there in the market today.
This DVD is just wonderful and can be looked at as a work of art/trip into new ground.
The Super Model Aria is hot and so is the rest of the cast of some of the most beautiful models that can be found in any video, the big names; gals like Nikki Fritz, and Zoe Paul and the exotic well known B movie Queen Larissa McComas all give awesome performances.
The deck is stacked with this high quality DVD and time will show us what a great erotic auture D.Kelly Marsalis truly is.
Even his music is awesome and leaves everything eles in the dust!
The bar has been raised by this visual genius and this DVD shows us why. This kind of erotic art will go over many folks head but if pin-up and erotic beauty is your thing this is a must have for you!
I want everyone who reads this to go and order California Dreams,
it is a pure one of a kind erotic video that is a must see!
We have featured this film makers work in our magazines and he is a true artist. Even his still photography is a thing of erotic beauty.
I have said it before and I'll say it again; D.Kelly Marsalis knows what we want to see and gives it to us every time out!

For anybody that likes Aria giovanni, this movie is a great buy.  The content is tasteful, there are many great settings and very beautiful scenery throughout the whole video.  One thing that makes this video special is that you actually get to hear her talk...and being herself it seems (not some made up character like in other movies).  Very Nice!
